name: NetScalerChangeServiceState
description: Changes the state of services on a Citrix NetScaler
author: Murat Tüfekçioğlu

inputs.name: NSAddress
inputs.label: Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the address of the NetScaler.

inputs.name: NSUserName
inputs.label: User name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the login name with sufficient rights.

inputs.name: NSPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the password for specified login name.
You can define a variable at the Build/Release definition like '$(ns.password)' and mark it as 'Secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: NSProtocol
inputs.label: Protocol
inputs.helpMarkDown: Protocol to use to connect to the api endpoint.

inputs.name: SkipCACheck
inputs.label: Test Certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you're using a self-signed certificate or the address is different than the one from the certificate, checking this prevents a certificate exception.

inputs.name: ServiceNames
inputs.label: Service Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Names of the services to enable or disable. You can enter multiple service names on seperate lines.

inputs.name: GracefulShutdown
inputs.label: GracefulShutdown
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if the services will be disabled gracefully.

inputs.name: GraceFulShutdownDelay
inputs.label: GraceFulShutdownDelay
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the graceful shutdown delay in seconds.
